short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for Gmail that enhances privacy and security

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Secure your Gmail workspace effortlessly with Kaption Gmail Privacy, a Chrome extension that automatically locks your screen and shields sensitive information within your Gmail tab.

Busy Professionals: If you’re constantly moving between meetings or stepping away from your desk, Kaption ensures your confidential emails stay private by automatically locking your Gmail screen during inactivity. Focus on your tasks without worrying about unauthorized glances at your screen.

Remote Workers and Shared Spaces: Whether you’re working from a coffee shop, a co-working space, or at home with family around, Kaption protects your sensitive emails from unintended viewers. Maintain professionalism and privacy no matter where you set up your office for the day.

Open Office Environments: In workplaces where screens are easily visible, Kaption helps prevent accidental exposure of confidential information. Safeguard your communications when colleagues pass by or during spontaneous collaborations, keeping sensitive data for your eyes only.

Privacy-Conscious Individuals: For anyone who values personal privacy, Kaption provides peace of mind by obscuring your Gmail content when you’re not actively using it. Protect personal conversations and sensitive information from prying eyes with this simple yet effective tool.
